attributes.action: Every Monday let it be non school uniform
attributes.additional_details: Teachers say we should be different how can we do that if we wear the same uniform have to sit it lines instead of sitting wear we want it’s a way to let us have a bit more freedom
attributes.background: Schools want us to have our own personalities and be our selves so let us do that by expressing our selves with our clothes

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because this would be the responsibility of the school and not the UK Government or Parliament.

You might want to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234997
